event.title: November 27, 1886 a group of 35 area residents petitioned

data.event: On November 27, 1886 a group of 35 area residents petitioned the county government "that they are desirous of having said territory organized as a village...That the name of the proposed village shall be New Swansea."
The residents voted on December 16, 1886, to form their own community and name it “New Swansea”.
And so a new municipality was incorporated on December 20, 1886.

event.title: 1898 the lot at the corner of Brackett and Illinois Streets was purchased

data.event: In 1898 the lot at the corner of Brackett and Illinois Streets was purchased for $300.
